mapper.select: SELECT cf.classifyId_n, cf.classifyName_m, cf.classifyClass_x, cf.seq_c, cg.categoryId_n, cg.categoryName_m, cg.path_x FROM cf_classify cf LEFT JOIN cf_category cg ON cf.classifyId_n = cg.classifyId_n WHERE cg.active_c = 'A' ORDER BY cf.seq_c ASC, cg.seq_c ASC

SELECT cf.classifyId_n AS classifyId, cf.classifyName_m AS classifyName, cf.classifyClass_x AS classifyClass, cf.seq_c AS sequence, cf.crtOn_dt AS createDate, cf.crtBy_m AS createBy, DATE_FORMAT(cf.crtOn_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS createDateStr, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cf_category WHERE classifyId_n = cf.classifyId_n AND active_c = 'A') AS activeCategory, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cf_category WHERE classifyId_n = cf.classifyId_n AND active_c = 'I') AS closedCategory FROM cf_classify cf ORDER BY cf.seq_c ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE cf_classify SET classifyName_m = #{classifyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classifyClass_x = #{classifyClass, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq_c = #{sequence, jdbcType=INTEGER}, updOn_dt = #{updateDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updBy_m = #{updateBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE classifyId_n = #{classifyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cf_classify ( classifyName_m, classifyClass_x, seq_c, status_x, crtOn_dt, crtBy_m ) VALUES ( #{classifyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classifyClass, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sequence, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
